attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to support the British film industry!

We all want more great films like 'The Italian Job' and 'Lawrence of Arabia' and so many more. Nearly every film that rolled out of the British film industry's studios was an instant classic.

Lets get this matter to Gordon Brown's attention and get him to promote and raise funding for British film studios such as Pinewood.

Thanks
